newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Win Win to be renamed PCL Enterprises.
newsitem.headline: Win Win to be renamed PCL Enterprises.

text.p: Win Win International Holdings Ltd proposed to change its name to PCL Enterprises Holdings Ltd following a change in management and business restructuring, the company said in a statement on Thursday.

The company said its business restructuring resulted from the sale of its trading interests and purchase of a 51 percent stake in semi-conductor maker Vitelic (Hong Kong) Ltd. It will hold a general meeting on December 2 to consider the plan.
Earlier this month, Win Win agreed to buy the stake in Vitelic (HK) from Mosel Vitelic Inc for HK$51.60 million. -- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6370
